name: The Switcher
description:
Run fast and avoid falling to your oblivion while choosing carefully your steps. 

Your challenge is to travel as far as you can before the bridge falls under your feet while jumping on the tiles of the same color of you. 

Left, right, forward. 

Think fast, think right!

Play on the go, play at home. Buying this Android game you get a PC version as a bonus! 

FEATURING: 

. Clear crisp minimalist and colorful graphics ;

. Unobtrusive menus, jump fast into action ;

. Highly replayable skill-based gameplay ;

. Very simple controls;

. Endless score-based gameplay challenge!
